data.lore: Hecarim is a towering, armored specter whose name is whispered fearfully across the length and breadth of Runeterra. He patrols the Shadow Isles, running down anyone foolish enough to set foot upon its cursed soil. As the vanguard of undeath, Hecarim rides forth from the Black Mist, laughing mockingly as he tramples the living beneath his iron-shod hooves.
data.name: Hecarim
data.title: the Shadow of War

spells.tooltip:
Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions and monsters)

If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.
spells.description: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. ({{ e5 }}% damage to minions and monsters) If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by {{ e3 }} second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to {{ e2 }} times.
spells.name: Rampage
spells.sanitizedDescription: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.

spells.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.
spells.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source. Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.
spells.name: Spirit of Dread
spells.sanitizedDescription: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.

spells.tooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge.
spells.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge.
spells.name: Devastating Charge
spells.sanitizedDescription: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.

spells.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to anyone they strike.

Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from Hecarim for {{ e2 }} second.

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.
spells.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to anyone they strike. Hecarim releases a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from Hecarim for {{ e2 }} second. Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.
spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows
spells.sanitizedDescription: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.

passive.name: Warpath
passive.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.
